full_summary:
# Office Ergonomic Assessment Service

**Title:** Office Ergonomic Assessment Service
**Reference Number:** PW-__ZH-150-41071
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** E60ZH-190000/E
**Publication Date:** 2022-08-09
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-11T14:00:00
**Region of Opportunity:** Across Canada, excluding areas of Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements

## Request for Standing Offer

Public Works and Government Services Canada is soliciting Standing Offers (SO) for the provision of Office Ergonomic Assessment Services to all federal government departments and crown corporations.

The requirement is for a supplier who can provide services for up to three years, from the date of issuance to March 31, 2024. Deliveries will be made across Canada, excluding areas of Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements. Suppliers are expected to comply with the mandatory requirements of this solicitation.

## Eligibility and Terms

Eligible suppliers must be Canadian companies capable of meeting the requirements of this solicitation. Suppliers are invited to submit an offer. Existing suppliers who received a Standing Offer under this solicitation can revise their financial offer and/or include additional information, such as regions or metropolitan areas. New suppliers must submit an offer in accordance with this solicitation.

## Requirements

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Trade agreements include CETA, WTO-AGP, CPTPP, CFTA, FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and the UK.

## Deadline and Evaluation Criteria

The tender closing date is October 11, 2022, at 14:00:00 local time. The evaluation criteria are the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

# Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* Mark Hall
* Phone: (613) 858-8626
* Email: [mark.hall@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.hall@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)

# Attachments

Attachments are available on the Canada Buys website. Please visit [www.canadabuys.ca](http://www.canadabuys.ca) to access attachments. YAML

I rewrote the tender announcement to make it more concise and clear. I previously included the original's information, but the rewritten entry only includes relevant information without redundant details
